summary: When a good-for-nothing man named Dan is stabbed to death and his arm broken, Charlie Chan is on the case. His first clue comes from the victim's sister, who noticed a prowler wearing a glow-in-the-dark wristwatch.
cast: Warner Oland|Heather Angel|Roger Imhof|John Warburton|Walter Byron|Ivan F. Simpson|Virginia Cherrill|Francis Ford|Robert Warwick|Frank McGlynn Sr.|Clara Blandick|Claude King|William Stack|Gloria Roy|Cornelius Keefe|Frances Chan|Alan Dong|David Dong|Frank Dong|Dorothy Hoo|Mabel Hoo
keywords: 1930s|charlie chan series|charlie chan character|four word title|detective
title: El cofre misterioso
